This article shows both: a Shaperskill for the table projections, and inline shaping with the key phrases table projection.Approaches for creating shapesShaper skills are usually placed at the end of a skillset, creating a view of the data thatyou want to pass to a projection.
This example creates a shape called "tableprojection"containing the following nodes: "reviews_text", "reviews_title","AzureSearch_DocumentKey", and sentiment scores and key phrases from pagedreviews.JSONUse a Shaper skill{     "@odata.type": "#Microsoft.Skills.Util.
